articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Anton Katz says Wall Street firms need tools that better connect them to trading opportunities similar to the ones they use on capital markets.
articles.title: How To Bring Wall Street Into Crypto? Build Better ‘Piping,’ Says Talos CEO

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Aragon is launching its namesake app and OSx protocol on the new Coinbase blockchain, which can help DAOs get off the ground without developer expertise.
articles.title: Aragon Aims to Accelerate DAO Launches With Base

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The influencer has launched Slivingland, a Roblox game inspired by a word she's been trying to get off the ground for almost four years.
articles.title: Paris Hilton Won't Stop Trying to Make 'Sliving' Happen

articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: The Metropolitan Museum has launched a quest based app and installed a virtual doppelgänger on the Roblox gaming platform to meet young visitors where they are.
articles.title: Why the MET Is Expanding Into the Metaverse With Roblox

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Center for Countering Digital Hate tested the safety guardrails of popular chatbots and found them lacking.
articles.title: Chatbot Makers Respond to Accusations That AI Promotes Eating Disorders

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The SEC this week did a lot of playing for time, but a new note on stablecoins by the Federal Reserve signaled a possible softening on crypto in Washington.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Prices Inch Upwards After PayPal Pitches Stablecoin

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: What happens when you mix microfinancing, a motorbike company in Kenya, and decentralized lending? Lots of risk.
articles.title: A Loan Is Still a Loan Even in DeFi

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Disgraced FTX founder and former CEO Sam Bankman-Fried was sent to jail for witness tampering—and crypto personalities didn't hold back.
articles.title: 'Hope You Enjoy Prison': Crypto Twitter Reacts as Sam Bankman-Fried's Bail Is Revoked

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The internet-famous rapper is apparently alive, but now there’s crypto confusion in the mix thanks to multiple Lil Tay-themed tokens.
articles.title: Degens Allegedly Launched Lil Tay Token Amid Teen Rapper's Death Hoax

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: “The bar is very high for banks to launch, and we cleared it," Custodia Bank CEO Caitlin Long told Decrypt.
articles.title: Custodia Bank Now Accepting US Dollar Deposits, Adding Bitcoin Custody

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: "The SEC is trying to short-circuit the legislative process" the consortium of crypto associations argued in its court brief.
articles.title: SEC Seeks to 'Usurp Congress's Authority' in Coinbase Lawsuit: Blockchain Association

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Over 47,000 negative player reviews have taken Blizzard to task for various complaints, from the free-to-play model to the missing PvE mode.
articles.title: 'Scammy Dumpster Fire'—Overwatch 2 Steam Debut Review Bombed Into Oblivion

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Disgraced FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried's bail has been revoked. He will be detained in jail until the start of his criminal trial in October.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Is Going to Jail, Judge Revokes Bail Over Witness Tampering

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Rockstar's open-world smash gains new life via AI—and the NPCs really have a mind of their own, with one ranting about a "divine AI god."
articles.title: This Grand Theft Auto 5 Mod Lets AI NPCs Insult You

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Elon Musk suggests the clash of the tech titans will happen in "an epic location" in Italy—though he may need surgery first.
articles.title: Are You Not Entertained? Elon Musk Says Fight With Zuck Will Be Livestreamed via Twitter, Meta

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Two research papers evaluating ChatGPT's accuracy conclude that the AI chatbot seems to be better at writing prescriptions than writing code.
articles.title: There’s More Evidence ChatGPT Is a Good Doctor But a Bad Coder

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: DeBank plans to launch a social media platform, DeBank Stream, by leveraging the 200,000-plus users on its chat app DeBank Hi.
articles.title: Ethereum DeFi Dashboard DeBank Launches Layer-2 on Optimism’s OP Stack

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: PREVIEW: Parallel is a competitive trading card game with NFTs—for fans of the genre and space operas alike. We go hands-on with the beta.
articles.title: 'Parallel' Puts an Epic Sci-Fi Spin on Complex NFT Card Battles

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Cave asserts AI overlooks the struggles in creativity and mechanizes the artistic process.
articles.title: Musician Nick Cave Rails Against AI: ChatGPT Is the 'Commodification of the Human Spirit'

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: With more attention than ever on Bitcoin ETFs, the SEC has again delayed its decision on the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF application.
articles.title: SEC Pumps Brakes on ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.
articles.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Global payment technology giant Visa has successfully completed a test that enables users to pay Ethereum gas fees using credit or debit cards.
articles.title: Visa Trials Ethereum Gas Fee Payments Using Cards

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Bitcoin mining can indeed help achieve decarbonization, but faces some stiff practical challenges along the way, researchers find.
articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Could Help Decarbonize Energy Grids, Researchers Say

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: One of the researchers said "burning your fingers is good for you," to an extent, because traders diversify and de-risk.
articles.title: Fool Me Once: Ethereum Traders Make More Money After Being Scammed

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Intellectual property, data privacy and cybersecurity are three areas that need to be addressed quickly, according to Gartner.
articles.title: Generative AI a Top Emerging Risk for Organizations: Gartner Survey

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The new chain has entered the top five layer-2 networks by total amount bridged, while daily active users hit 136,000.
articles.title: $170M Bridged to Coinbase Layer-2 Base as Daily Active Users Hit 136,000

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The first Ethereum futures ETF could be launched as soon as October 2023—that is, if the SEC approves it.
articles.title: These Are the High-Profile Ethereum Futures ETF Applications Currently in Play

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: LSDfi is a fast growing space within DeFi. Now Binance is throwing capital into it.
articles.title: Binance Labs Invests $10M to Accelerate Helio Protocol's Liquid Staking Pivot

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Bitcoin supporters back the celebs’ take on CBDCs as the “digital dollar” discussion reaches mainstream audiences.
articles.title: Post Malone Disses CBDCs on Joe Rogan Podcast—And Bitcoiners Love It

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: An $8.5 billion merger between luxury giants could have major implications for the future of blockchain in fashion.
articles.title: As Coach Swallows Versace, A Crypto Divide Grows in Luxury Fashion

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Investors pumped $297 million into the fledging crypto video game industry in July, but metaverse NFT sales have slowed significantly.
articles.title: Crypto Gaming Investments Surged in July as Metaverse NFTs Fizzled Out

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Pioneering generative artist Casey Reas will release "923 Empty Rooms" with Bright Moments and Art Blocks at live events spanning six cities.
articles.title: The Godfather of Generative Art Goes Global

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The FTX affiliate first sued Grayscale in March. Now it says it needs more time to find a co-plaintiff.
articles.title: Alameda Hits a Snag in Lawsuit Over $9 Billion Locked in Grayscale Bitcoin Trust

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Four months after the SEC sued, bankrupt exchange Bittrex has agreed to a settlement without admitting to or denying the allegations.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Bittrex Agrees to Pay $24 Million to Settle SEC Lawsuit

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Trying to use up leftovers? An AI-powered app produced ghastly results when users input things like "turpentine" and "ant-poison."
articles.title: AI Is Literally Trying to Kill You With This Grocery Store App

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: One of the biggest games on the planet wants to let creators design games by typing prompts. Here’s how Roblox is approaching AI.
articles.title: Roblox Is Tapping AI to Generate 'More Rich and Dynamic' Games: CEO

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: A letter supporting the motion accused Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss of a “Twitter-based character assassination campaign.”
articles.title: Digital Currency Group Wants 'Hodgepodge' Gemini Lawsuit Tossed Out

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Users will soon be able to trade the cryptocurrency on the platform.
articles.title: Gemini Opens XRP Deposits and Trading Following Ripple Labs Partial Victory

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Inflation has trended downward since it hit 9.1% last June, but the Fed’s target of 2% is the ultimate goal.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Trade Sideways as Inflation Jumps to 3.2% in July

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The Xverse wallet supports projects like Ordinals, Stacks, and the blockchain’s speedy Lightning Network.
articles.title: Jump Crypto Leads $5 Million Seed Round in Bitcoin Wallet Xverse

articles.description: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.
articles.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM

articles.description: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.
articles.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza

articles.description: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.
articles.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup

articles.description: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.
articles.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges

articles.description: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.
articles.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee

articles.description: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
articles.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.
articles.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
